data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Tetovo, North Macedonia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tetovo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Tetovo, North Macedonia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tetovo, North Macedonia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Tetovo, North Macedonia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Albanian, Macedonian people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tetovo, North Macedonia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 53,000 souls in Tetovo and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tetovo, North Macedonia has a population of 53,000.

We estimate Tetovo has 88 people who might know Jesus, 32,757 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,155 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 602 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Tetovo, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
